item.title: Bollard needs reinstating., 25th March
item.description:
A bollard protecting the cycle only section of St George's Place was damaged and removed because it was unsafe. Please can this be replaced because cars are now parking in the cycle in only section, blocking it for all users.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Saint Georges Place, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)
